## Token list PRs (read first)

**Unsolicited token listing PRs are not accepted.** If you are requesting a token listing, please follow `README.md` â†’ **Token Listing Process** (BD approval required).

If this PR comes from a fork **and** modifies `src/tokens/` or `assets/`, it may be automatically closed as spam.

---

## What does this PR do?

- [ ] Add tokens
- [ ] Remove tokens
- [ ] Update metadata (name/symbol/decimals/logoURI)
- [ ] Other (explain below)

## Details

Describe the change and include any relevant context/links (explorer links, project website, BD approval reference, etc.).
